Description: Purposes: Deciding how to spend your time and effort may not always be easy, but it’s what makes living so fun. We all have virtually infinite paths we can walk, and the gift of life is to slowly unearth a path that makes us tick. To encourage people to think more deeply about what they want out of life, this scholarship will support one person from any background or educational level who is committed to making the most of their time on this spinning rock.

ScholarshipName: A. A. Milne Memorial 3-5 Sentence Story Scholarship
Description:
Purposes:

"A. A. Milne’s changed countless lives with his stories, and could communicate wonderful, universal sentiments in just a few sentences. Flex your creativity and share a 3-5 sentence story that you feel shares something about you. We can’t wait to hear what you have to say! Selections will be made based on creativity, originality, and self-expression. Please apply at https://www.keepgoingforward.org/aamilnescholarship"

Associate Degree
Bachelor's Degree
Graduate Degree

Professional Development

ScholarshipName: AABB-Fenwal Specialist in Blood Bank Scholarship Awards
Description: Purposes: To recognize individuals who are enrolled, accepted for enrollment in, or who have recently completed training (within12 months) leading to SBB certification from an AABB-accredited institution.

Purposes: To provide an resident or fellow who has completed at least two years of postgraduate training in a surgical discipline the opportunity to spend one year in a full-time research position with an AAS member.
Purposes: To honor outstanding doctoral research on Canada at American institutions.
Purposes: To improve the teaching/learning process in the library and classroom and to supplement the recipient's training by extending the use of educational communications and technology.
Purposes: To support graduate study at the doctoral level in the field of educational communications and technology.
Purposes: To support the work of investigators from all disciplines that contribute to the understanding of suicide and suicide prevention.
